title: Ethnicity distribution of acting winners at the Academy Awards 1928 to 2015
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Awards on X-axis for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share.
For Award Best Actress, White had the highest Share 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest Share 11.0.
There is a gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest Share found for White in Award Best Actress and Best Actor.
On average, the Award Best Actor had the highest Share for all 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. Whereas Best Actress had the lowest average Share.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
For Award Best Actress, White had the highest Share 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest Share 11.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Awards on X-axis for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share.
For Award Best Actress, White had the highest Share 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest Share 11.0.
There is a gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest Share found for White in Award Best Actress and Best Actor.
On average, the Award Best Actor had the highest Share for all 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. Whereas Best Actress had the lowest average Share.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Awards on X-axis for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share.
For Award Best Actress, White had the highest Share 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest Share 11.0.
For Award Best Actress, White had the maximum Share and it saw the lowest in Award Best Actor out of all 2 Awards.
The maximum Share for White that was found in Award Best Actress was 1.06 times larger than the minimum Share observed in Award Best Actor.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share was found in case of White.
Averaging all 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities, the Award Best Actor is the maximum Share and Best Actress is the minimum Share.
